nodes.description: ISIS于2014年1月开始统治拉卡市，并持续了近四年。
nodes.support_text: ...during their rule of the city that began in January 2014 and lasted for nearly four years.

nodes.description: 美国支持的叙利亚民主军于2017年10月占领了拉卡。
nodes.support_text: Blasts have occurred since US-backed fighters of the Syrian Democratic Forces captured Raqqa in October 2017.

nodes.description: 经过多次攻势，ISIS于3月23日被宣布已被消灭。
nodes.support_text: Several offensives with US-led coalition backing chipped away at ISIS until it was declared eliminated on March 23.

nodes.description: 4月9日，ISIS在拉卡实施了一起造成13人死亡的双重爆炸袭击。
nodes.support_text: On April 9, a double bombing claimed by ISIS killed 13 people, mostly civilians, in the militant group's former bastion.

nodes.description: 周六，拉卡发生两起爆炸，造成10人死亡。
nodes.support_text: Two explosions killed 10 people in Raqqa on Saturday in the latest attacks to hit the city in northern Syria, opposition activists reported.

nodes.description: 开斋饭结束了白天的斋戒。
nodes.support_text: the meal after sunset (iftar) breaks day-long fasting

nodes.description: 反对派活动人士报道了这起爆炸事件。
nodes.support_text: opposition activists reported the explosion event

nodes.description: ISIS武装分子在他们统治期间展示了被绞死的尸体或头颅。
一名自杀式袭击者当时正驾驶着一辆车。
伏击和打了就跑的袭击在两个国家持续发生。
nodes.support_text: Ambushes and hit-and-run attacks have continued in both countries, with ISIS militants still scattered in the Syrian desert.

edges.support_text: Blasts have occurred since US-backed fighters of the Syrian Democratic Forces captured Raqqa in October 2017.

Blasts have occurred since US-backed fighters of the Syrian Democratic Forces captured Raqqa in October 2017. Several offensives with US-led coalition backing chipped away at ISIS until it was declared eliminated on March 23.

until it was declared eliminated on March 23. Ambushes and hit-and-run attacks have continued in both countries, with ISIS militants still scattered in the Syrian desert. On April 9, a double bombing claimed by ISIS killed 13 people...
